nodes.text: The Necr'ygor system was located in the Chommell sector, a part of the Trailing Sectors portion of the Mid Rim. It was the origin point of the Necr'ygor Omic wine.
The Necr'ygor system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-16.
